text: Ana ŵanganyaŵa ngakwendajenda pa chilambo ni kupitaga nchilola mujaŵelele mbesi ja aŵala ŵapaujo pao, ŵaŵaliji soni ŵamachili nnope kwapunda ŵanganyaŵa? Sano Allah nganaŵa jwanti ni kunkulupuka chindu chilichose ku mawunde namuno petaka, chisimu Jwalakwe aŵele Jwakumanyilila nnope, Jwakombola kusyene
